p: Our study found that the average unsaponifiable matter values for baobab crude oil samples were 1.22 ± 0.06, 1.17 ± 0.09, and 0.90 ± 0.08 for Iringa, Dodoma, and Kilimanjaro regions, respectively ( Table 2). The highest and the lowest values for baobab crude oil samples were obtained from Dodoma and Kilimanjaro regions, respectively.
